means: 未受到照料的，被忽略了的

sentence.Network_en: A watched flower never blooms, but an untended willow grows.
sentence.Network_cn: 有心栽花花不开,无心插柳柳成荫.

sentence.Network_en: Untended garden was soon overgrown with weeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 无人照看的花园很快长满了野草.

sentence.Network_en: Eyewitness said the bomb went off as the waiter was checking an [ untended ] unattended bag.
sentence.Network_cn: 目击者说正当服务生在检查一个 毫 不起眼的包裹时,爆炸发生了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 社会工作专业英语词汇(U) ... untenable arguments 站不住脚的论点 untended 未受到照顾的 unthinkable 难以想象的.
untended garden was soon overgrown with weeds .无人照看的花园很快长满了野草。
untended garden was soon overgrown with weeds ; untended children ., 没人照料的花园很快长满了野草 ; 没人照料的孩子.

however , the sudden fury of last night's spring rainstorm , moved those untended ferryboats away from shore , leaving them crossways in the middle of the stream .可是，黑夜的春雨狂暴急剧，在自然的威力下，那些没有人照料的渡船，难免会被冲离岸边，横在江中。

list.abs: ...新产品进入市场期(Time-to- Market)是现代金切加工解决方案的一个重要内容，这就是开发“长时间无人看管加工”（untended or unattended machining）又称“无人或熄灯生产”(unmanned or lights-out production)。

the economic consequences of the Black Death were far-reaching . as a result of the plague , much land was left untended and there was a terrible shortage of labor .黑死病对经济造成了很深远的影响，鼠疫导致了大片土地无人照管和劳动力极度匮乏。

sentences.sentence: "untended garden was soon overgrown with weeds"
